documents.document: @robertdall Right there with you.

Day 3: Still haven't been outside. Tempted to walk around the block.
I haven't set foot outdoors in 2 days.😷 I hear I'm not missing much though. ❄️
I just discovered that Netflix is pretty good when you're stuck at home sick. Also https://t.co/3Of4gTQ3bE is available for AppleTV.
@eyeglasspro I think you should stop selling Trump products.
@chriscoyier @AMPhtml @ShopTalkShow That was excellent.
Called in sick to work then opened the blinds and saw the snow. TBH I'd rather be trudging through it, to work, healthy.
The cough that feels like you're being hit on the back of the head with a log. 😖

Dropped a fancy flashlight into a hole in the wall behind the TV & now I have a bright light shining through the other hole until it dies. 😖
